entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then rain showers at times heavy or flurries beginning early this afternoon then changing to flurries late this afternoon and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
